text: Parke Gerald Zinzan Harris was born on 18 July 1927. He died on 1 December 1991. His nickname was Zin. Harris was a New Zealand cricketer who played in nine Test matches between 1955 and 1965. His sons, Chris and Ben, also played cricket. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:1991 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Zin Harris
